text.div:
CRCInvolvedNotinvolved

Indicates whether a colorectal tumour specimen was involved or not involved.

Copyright Statement: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright Â© 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    369691009Large intestine, distal surgical margin, involved by tumor (finding)
    372446006Anal, distal surgical margin involved by tumor (finding)
    369690005Large intestine, proximal surgical margin, involved by tumor (finding)
    372444009Anal, proximal surgical margin involved by tumor (finding)
    369708000Large intestine, distal surgical margin not involved by tumor (finding)
    372445005Anal, distal surgical margin not involved by tumor (finding)
    369707005Large intestine, proximal surgical margin not involved by tumor (finding)
    372443003Anal, proximal surgical margin not involved by tumor (finding)
